doc.title: Hanci
doc.plot: Turhan is married, with a lovely daughter named Hulya. He falls in love with a singer named Leyla. Leyla craves for a wealthy life. Turhan, not wishing to do so, commits a crime and kills his boss to provide a fortune for his beloved Leyla. He is caught and arrested. His daughter Hulya is told that her father has died. One day in the cemetery she meets Turhan's dead boss's son Yilmaz and they falls in love with each other. As Yilmaz's mother goes to ask for the girl's hand for his son, the reality is revealed yet Hulya does not know about it. Yilmaz rejects to marry Hulya, however his mother believes in letting bygones be bygones. Yilmaz agrees to marry Hulya whom he loves above all.
